isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE / 9200 9300 9400 MODELS BUILT AFTER JANUARY 1, 1995 - ELECTRONIC ENGINE CONTROLS - CATERPILLAR - 1992-1993 - Service Procedure

svcproc.title: Service Procedure
svcproc.para: This chapter covers International installed components and circuits that directly interact with both:

item.para: The Caterpillar PEEC III Electronic Engine Control System available with 3406C engines.
The Caterpillar 3176 engine Electronic Engine Control System.

svcproc.para: There are significant differences in the two engine families, but few differences in the International installed circuits. This chapter:

item.para: Provides operation descriptions of International installed components and related circuits that work with the Caterpillar Electronic Engine Controls.
Provides circuit diagrams and connector composites for International electrical circuits.

Does not provideengine diagnostics, but does provide step-by-step troubleshooting guides for International installed components and circuits. These guides should be used when the Caterpillar PEEC III or 3176 Engine Diagnostics indicate a problem may be present in a International circuit or component.

svcproc.para: Additional references are Mobile Training Manuals:
